TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BindingContext extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type BindingContext = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 管理任何继承自 类的对象的 对象集合。

span.span: Manages the collection of objects for any object that inherits from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个 Windows 窗体至少具有一个管理窗体的 对象的 对象。Each Windows Form has at least one object that manages the objects for the form. 由于 类是抽象的，因此 属性的返回类型为 或 。Because the class is abstract, the return type of the property is either a or a . 如果数据源是只能返回单个属性的对象（而不是对象的列表），则 为 。If the data source is an object that can return only a single property (instead of a list of objects), the is a . 例如，如果指定 作为数据源，则返回 。For example, if you specify a as the data source, a is returned. 另一方面，如果数据源是实现 或 的对象，则返回 。On the other hand, if the data source is an object that implements or , a is returned. 对于 Windows 窗体上的每个数据源，都有单个 或 。For each data source on a Windows Form, there is a single or . 由于可能存在多个与 Windows 窗体关联的数据源，因此 允许您检索与数据源关联的任何特定 。Because there may be multiple data sources associated with a Windows Form, the enables you to retrieve any particular associated with a data source. > [!NOTE] > 使用 属性时，如果不存在新 ，则 会创建一个新的。When using the property, the creates a new if one does not already exist. 这可能会导致一些混乱，因为返回的对象可能不会管理你打算的列表（或任何列表）。This can lead to some confusion, as the returned object may not manage the list (or any list) that you intend. 若要防止返回无效的 ，请使用 方法来确定预期 是否已存在。To prevent returning an invalid , use the method to determine if the intended already exists. 如果使用容器控件（例如 、或 ）来包含数据绑定控件，则可以只为该容器控件及其控件创建 。If you use a container control, such as a , , or , to contain data-bound controls, you can create a for just that container control and its controls. 然后，窗体的每个部分都可以由其自己的 管理。Then, each part of your form can be managed by its own . 有关为同一数据源创建多个 对象的详细信息，请参阅 构造函数。See the constructor for more information about creating multiple objects for the same data source. 如果将 控件添加到窗体，并将其绑定到数据集中的表的列，则该控件将与该窗体的 通信。If you add a control to a form and bind it to a column of a table in a dataset, the control communicates with the of that form. 将与该数据关联的特定 进行通信。The , in turn, talks to the specific for that data association. 如果您查询了 的 `Position` 属性，它将报告该 控件的绑定的当前记录。If you queried the `Position` property of the , it would report the current record for the binding of that control. 在下面的代码示例中， 控件通过其所基于的窗体的 绑定到 `dataSet1` 数据集中的 `Customers` 表的 `FirstName` 列。In the following code example, a control is bound to the `FirstName` column of a `Customers` table on the `dataSet1` dataset through the for the form it is on. ```vb TextBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName") ``` ```csharp textBox1.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` ```cpp textBox1->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.FirstName"); ``` 您可以向窗体中添加第二个 控件（`TextBox2`），并将其绑定到同一个数据集中 `Customers` 表的 `LastName` 列。You can add a second control (`TextBox2`) to the form and bind it to the `LastName` column of the `Customers` table in the same dataset. 知道第一个绑定（`TextBox1` `Customers.FirstName`），因此它将使用相同的 ，因为这两个文本框都绑定到同一个数据集（`DataSet1`）。The is aware of the first binding (`TextBox1` to `Customers.FirstName`), so it would use the same , as both text boxes are bound to the same dataset (`DataSet1`). ```vb TextBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName") ``` ```csharp textBox2.DataBindings.Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` ```cpp textBox2->DataBindings->Add("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.LastName"); ``` 如果将 `TextBox2` 绑定到不同的数据集，则 创建并管理第二个 。If you bind `TextBox2` to a different dataset, the creates and manages a second . 务必要一致地设置 和 属性;否则， 将为同一个数据集创建多个货币管理器，这将导致错误。It is important to be consistent about how you set the and properties; otherwise, the creates multiple currency managers for the same dataset, which results in errors. 下面的代码示例演示了几种设置属性及其关联 对象的方法。The following code example shows a few ways to set the properties and their associated objects. 您可以使用以下任一方法来设置属性，前提是您在代码中保持一致。You can set the properties using either of the following methods, as long as you are consistent throughout your code. ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1 ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1, "Customers").Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1, "Customers"].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "Customers.FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1, "Customers")->Position = 1; ``` ```vb ComboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers ComboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName" Me.BindingContext(dataSet1.Customers).Position = 1 ``` ```csharp comboBox1.DataSource = DataSet1.Customers; comboBox1.DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this.BindingContext[dataSet1.Customers].Position = 1; ``` ```cpp comboBox1->DataSource = dataSet1->Customers; comboBox1->DisplayMember = "FirstName"; this->BindingContext->get_Item(dataSet1->Customers)->Position = 1; ``` > [!NOTE] > 大多数 Windows 窗体的应用程序通过 进行绑定。Most Windows Forms applications bind through a . 组件封装了 并公开了 编程接口。The component encapsulates a and exposes the programming interface. 使用 进行绑定时，应使用 公开的成员操作 "currency" （即 `Position`），而不是通过 。When using a for binding, you should use the members exposed by the to manipulate "currency" (that is, `Position`) rather than go through the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建了四个 对象用于将五个控件（ 和四个 控件）绑定到多个数据源。The following code example creates four objects to bind five controls - a and four controls - to several data sources. 然后，使用 获取每个数据源的 。The is then used to get the for each data source. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要为同一数据源具有多个 实例，请创建新的 并将其设置为继承自 类的对象的 属性。If you want to have multiple instances for the same data source, create a new and set it to the property of an object that inherits from the class. 例如，如果有两个 对象（来自两个不同的 对象），则可以将每个 的 属性设置为不同的值。For example, if you have two objects (from two different objects), you can set the properties of each to different values. 这将导致每个数据绑定控件集显示同一个数据源中的不同值。This causes each set of data-bound controls to display different values from the same data source. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建两个新的 对象，并将每个对象分配给 控件的 属性。The following code example creates two new objects and assigns each object to the property of a control. `GroupBox1` 包含 `TextBox1`，`GroupBox2` 包含 `TextBox2` （通过使用 类的 方法来完成）。`GroupBox1` contains `TextBox1`, and `GroupBox2` contains `TextBox2` (which is accomplished by using the method of the class). 然后，该示例将 对象添加到这两个 控件，并将每个对象绑定到相同的数据源和数据成员。The example then adds objects to the two controls, binding each to the same data source and data member. 该示例还显示了两个事件处理程序，它们使用 控件中的 来设置不同 对象上的 属性。The example also shows two event handlers that use the from the controls to set the property on different objects. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.BindingContext Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要的 不需要导航路径，请使用此重载。Use this overload if the you want does not require a navigation path. 例如，如果 管理一组使用 或 作为 的 对象，则无需导航路径。For example, if the manages a set of objects that use an or as the , no navigation path is required. > [!NOTE] > 属性将始终返回 ，并且绝不会返回 `null`。The property will always return a , and never return `null`. 有关可能的数据源的列表，请参阅 类，有关在控件和数据源之间创建绑定的信息，请参阅。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. ## Examples 下面的代码示例返回三个 对象：一个用于 ，一个用于 ，另一个用于属于 控件的 的 中。The following code example returns three objects: one for a , one for an , and one for the of a that belongs to a control. [!code-cpp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindingContext.this Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindingContext.this Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 管理一组包含多个对象的 对象时，请使用此重载。Use this overload when the manages a set of objects for which the data source contains multiple objects. 例如，一个 可以包含由 对象链接的多个 对象。For example, a can contain several objects linked by objects. 在这种情况下，导航路径是必需的，以便让 返回正确的 。In such a case, the navigation path is required to enable the to return the correct . > [!NOTE] > 当 `dataMember` 参数有效时， 属性将始终返回 。The property will always return a , when the `dataMember` parameter is valid. 它绝不会返回 `null`。It will never return `null`. 有关可能的数据源的列表，请参阅 类，有关在控件和数据源之间创建绑定的信息，请参阅。See the class for a list of possible data sources and for information about creating bindings between controls and data sources. 如果所需 管理列表，则导航路径也必须以列表结尾。If the desired manages a list, the navigation path must also end with a list. 例如，以下C#代码将 控件绑定到订单表中的订单日期。For example, the following C# code binds a control to the order date in a table of orders. 导航路径包括 、和 。The navigation path includes the , the , and the . 但是，只能使用 和 （解析为列表）检索 。However, the must be retrieved using only the and (which resolves to a list). ``` // The navigation path for a Binding ends with a property. textBox1.DataBindings.Add ("Text", dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders.OrderDate"); // The navigation path for the BindingManagerBase ends with a list. BindingManagerBase bmOrders = this.BindingContext [dataSet1, "Customers.custToOrders"]; ``` 返回 时，应使用与 相同的数据源，并仅修改导航路径。When returning a , you should use the same data source as the and modify only the navigation path. 使用 方法来确定所需的 是否已存在。Use the method to determine if the desired already exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 检索特定绑定的 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the to retrieve the for a particular binding. 它还说明了如何处理 的 事件，以确保在更改其中一个控件值时，绑定到同一个数据源的多个控件保持同步。It also shows how to handle the event for the to ensure multiple controls bound to the same data source remain synchronized when one of the control values is changed. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到 Windows 窗体中，并从窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法调用 `InitializeControlsAndData` 方法。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call the `InitializeControlsAndData` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.BindingSourceMultipleControls/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
